title: Report: Apple will introduce a new iPhone SE with A15, 5G in early 2022
content:
• The 2020 iPhone SE. [credit: Samuel Axon ]

Multiple recent reports from Apple's supply chain have indicated that a new, greatly upgraded iPhone SE is on the way.

According to Nikkei, the new iPhone SE is expected to launch in early 2022. The device will feature the same iPhone 8-style design as the existing iPhoneâ€”home button included.

But the new SE will have what will be the most recent iPhone system-on-a-chip, the A15, which is expected to debut with Apple's new flagship phones this fall.

Read 6 remaining paragraphs | Comments
author: Samuel Axon
